document.full_text: the fbi plans to sharpen its focus on the increased threat of cyber attacks over the next two years, fbi director robert mueller said on wednesday, in the wake of a recent attack on google's email system.
document.title: fbi director says to boost focus on cyber threats
lines_and_colors: the fbi plans to sharpen its focus on the increased threat of cyber attacks over the next two years, fbi director robert mueller said on wednesday, in the wake of a recent attack on google's email system.
